slogan: A place where those who are on the twin flame journey can connect!
disclaimer: <1>Disclaimer:</1> This website is an public forum open to anyone interested in twin flames and/or spiritual connections, friendships, and relationships. In no way is this website affiliated with any cults or cult practices. This website in no way condones any behaviors such as harassment or stalking. This website is intended as a public forum for like-minded invividuals to connect with others who share similar beliefs with the idea of helping to facilitate further growth mentally, emotionally, and spiritually in all aspects of their lives. This is a community monitered forum; All belief systems and ideologies need to be respected. Offensive behavior, such as trolling, will not be tolerated.
